::Terrataur::
       She nods. "Windlord was hurt but he's recovering in the CR chamber."  
She shakes her head.  "Why won't they just leave us alone?  They were here 
when we arrived, attacking.  You'd think they'd be tired of it by now."

--part1_6e.16e55349.29885f6a_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
